Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 8:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 81 km
Humidity: 57 %

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023
